name: Be Honest
description:
Check out this new FuzzBee quiz, I was paranoid for weeks after I took it! Creepy stuff.

I recommend downloading the windows build if you can, there are some features which don't work on the web!

If you liked this, you might like my other horror games, or more survey horror.

If you want a heads up when I release more horror games, subscribe to the email list -> link to email list

This game was built as part of the Tiny Mass Games collective. TMG focuses on polished short-form games on two-month timelines. You can find more Tiny Mass Games at https://tinymassgames.itch.io/

Indie horror streamers! I made a streamer kit for you, it has all the creepy art from the game in it, feel free to use it in your thumbnails (they're all in the public domain) https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1fzLuPGNEBHkx1Yxzl3sYI5mjYTQTJbrU?usp=sha... And if there's anything you want that isn't in there, just let me know and I'll add it. Thanks!
